outcome: IN LP 3/2001 of J.M.F.C.-II, SULTHANBATHERY PETITIONER: ABBAS ALI @ HAMSA AGED 37 YEARS S/O.ALAVIKKUTTY HAJI, KUNNEDATH HOUSE, PERUMANNA VILLAGE, TIRUR TALUK, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT. BY ADVS. SMT .CHITHR
full_text: oe sees | cH ae 2019/KER/1200 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW WEDNESDAY ,THE 09TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 8317 of 2018 AGAINST THE JUDGMENT IN SC 41/2018 of ADDL. D.C. & SESSIONS COURT - II, KALPETTA AGAINST THE ORDER IN LP 3/2001 of J.M.F.C.-II, SULTHANBATHERY PETITIONER: ABBAS ALI @ HAMSA AGED 37 YEARS S/O.ALAVIKKUTTY HAJI, KUNNEDATH HOUSE, PERUMANNA VILLAGE, TIRUR TALUK, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT. BY ADVS. SMT .CHITHRA R.SHENOY SRI.N.MANU THAMPI SRI.T.R.HARI KRISHNAN RESPONDENT: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY ITS PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. SRI.ALEX M THOMBRA SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bal os Tal ss op a 2019/KER/1200 Cr1.MC.No. 8317 of 2018 2 ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioner is the accused in S.C.No.41 of 2018 on the file of the Add. Sessions Court-II, Kalpetta. He was granted bail during the investigation on condition that he shall surrender his passport. Accordingly, he has surrendered his passport in the committal court. He filed an application in the trial court to return the passport. So that he may renew it by Annexure-III order. The trail court has dismissed it on the ground that the passport was not surrendered in that court. After hearing both sides, I am satisfied that a direction may be issued to the Sessions Court to return the passport so that the petitioner may renew it and surrender it within ten days of its delivery to him. Tf the passport has not been sent to the trial court the learned Sessions Judge shall send for Peel | [oH ae 2019/KER/1200 Cr1.MC.No. 8317 of 2018 3 it and comply with this direction. With the above direction, this Crl.M.C is closed. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE pm oe sees | cH ae 2019/KER/1200 Cr1.MC.No. 8317 of 2018 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE NO.TI COPY OF ORDER IN BAIL APPL NO. 6230/2017 OF HON'BLE HIGH COURT IN CRIME 263/1998 OF PULPILLY POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE NO.II COPY OF PETITION CRL.MP 2020/2018 IN SC 41/2018 FILED U/S.439(1) OF CRPC BEFORE THE COURT OF ADDL.SESSIONS JUDGE-II, KALPETTA. ANNEXURE NO.III CERTIFIED COPY OF THE ORDER IN CRL.MP 2020/2018 IN SC 41/2018 PASSED BY THE COURT OF ADDL. SESSIONS JUDGE-II, KALPETTA. RESPONDENT'S EXHIBITS: NIL // TRUE cCoPYy // PA TO JUDGE
